title: House Dressing
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - ½ cup Squid Brand fish sauce
directions: 1. Combine the chilies and garlic and ½ cup of the lime juice in a blender and blend until just coarsely chopped. Add the remaining ½ cup lime juice, the fish sauce, sugar, and ¾ cup of cold water and blend until smooth but flecks of the chili are still visible.
2. Transfer the dressing to a container with a tight-fitting lid and store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
